p: Cyclooxygenase inhibitory activity is an important tool to control the inflammation process in the human body. In fact, inflammation is an important physiological response of autoimmune activation, infection, or cellular injury. The excess production of proinflammatory mediators may cause different kinds of severe and chronic inflammation that lead to several illnesses including atherosclerosis, multiple sclerosis, asthma, arthritis, and rheumatoid arthritis [ 56].
